alert.note: Alert for Butte (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued April 12 at 3:27AM MDT until April 14 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT MDT WEDNESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Snow and areas of blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations are forecast to range from an inch or less over most of eastern and far southern Butte County, to 2 to 5 inches across northwest Butte County and northeast Crook County. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph today and tonight, with some gusts of 50 to 60 mph expected on Wednesday. * WHERE...In Wyoming, Northeastern Crook County. In South Dakota, Butte County. * WHEN...Until midnight MDT Wednesday night. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Strong winds could cause tree damage.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions are expected. This will create dangerous conditions. Road conditions are available on your smartphone from the 5 1 1 app for your state.
